This repository contains a technical annex for the deliverable **D3.7 PoliRural GitHub Account**.

The document, **GitHub Fundamentals. OpenAIRE & Zenodo infrastructures**, compiles some basic information about `GitHub` and its interaction with the European `OpenAIRE` infrastructure, especially through Zenodo repository. It can be downloaded in [docx]() or [PDF]().
